item.title: Emote Buttons?
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

Im adding new emote buttons. this is what i’ve done to add. but they still dont work…
Emote buttons are cases. so i made the case ( Which is 170 for me ) to tele you to a place.
it looked like .

case 170: //mine tele if(emotes == 0) { teleportToX = 3281; teleportToY = 2768; } else { emotes = 0; pEmote = playerSE; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

and i edited this

sendFrame126("@red@Bank", 180);//first emote slot sendFrame126("@blu@Train",181); sendFrame126("@cya@Jad", 178); sendFrame126("@whi@Fally",175); sendFrame126("@whi@Shop",177); sendFrame126("@red@Gho",182);
which is the emote buttons. to look like this :

sendFrame126("@red@Bank", 180);//first emote slot sendFrame126("@blu@Train",181); sendFrame126("@cya@Jad", 178); sendFrame126("@whi@Fally",175); sendFrame126("@ora@Mine",170); sendFrame126("@whi@Shop",177); sendFrame126("@red@Gho",182);
as u can see the New sendframe Mine has 170 next to it. which im pretty sure is its case.

It’s half worked. when i click on “Laugh” it tele’s me to my mining place. but the name hasnt changed to “mine” its still " laugh "

=[ anyone help?

Read full topic
